name: @bhanudeep/tenant-manager
description: A framework-agnostic TypeScript package for multi-tenant applications with dynamic theming, asset management, and configuration loading

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:adapters && npm run build:index
scripts.build:adapters: npm run copy:adapters && npm run create:adapter-entries
scripts.copy:adapters: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/angular dist/ && cp -r src/react dist/ && cp -r src/vue dist/
scripts.build:index: tsc src/index.ts --outDir dist --declaration --target ES2020 --module ESNext --moduleResolution node --strict --skipLibCheck
scripts.create:adapter-entries: npm run create:angular-entry && npm run create:react-entry && npm run create:vue-entry
scripts.create:angular-entry: tsc src/angular/index.ts --outDir dist/angular --declaration --target ES2020 --module ESNext --moduleResolution node --strict --skipLibCheck --allowJs
scripts.create:react-entry: echo 'export * from "../core/interfaces.js"; export { TenantConfigCore } from "../core/tenant-config.core.js";' > dist/react/index.js && echo 'export * from "../core/interfaces"; export { TenantConfigCore } from "../core/tenant-config.core"; export declare const TenantConfigProvider: any; export declare function useReactTenantConfig(): any; export declare function withTenantConfig(component: any): any;' > dist/react/index.d.ts
scripts.create:vue-entry: echo 'export * from "../core/interfaces.js"; export { TenantConfigCore } from "../core/tenant-config.core.js";' > dist/vue/index.js && echo 'export * from "../core/interfaces"; export { TenantConfigCore } from "../core/tenant-config.core"; export declare const TenantConfigPlugin: any; export declare function useVueTenantConfig(): any; export declare function useTenantConfigWithInit(options?: any): any; export declare function createTenantConfigPlugin(options?: any): any; export declare const TenantConfigKey: any; export declare const VueTenantConfigPlugin: any;' > dist/vue/index.d.ts

author: UTU Development Team
